TopicTitle: How would I apply the ksp breaking ground DLC to my game (I'm on pc )

Articles.Content: I'm really excited for the new KSP breaking ground DLC but I don't know how to apply it to my game when it comes out because I would know how to install it on my computer but which game files would I put it into.

Don't you think that they will give you specific install instructions when the thing will be released?

If you buy it on Steam it will be installed automatically, if you bought in anywhere else you most likely either get an installer or have to manually put a folder into your GameData folder just like you would do it with any mod out there.
They have a downloader for it, that's how.

21 hours ago, Harry Rhodan said:
